title: strange warnings in the background of personal page
body:
in my personal settings page, i sometimes have strange warnings like this (i think since the upgrade to 4.5.5):
```
warning: strpos(): offset not contained in string in /www/oc/apps/files_sharing/lib/util.php on line 39
call stack:
0.0001 631472 1. {main}() /www/oc/settings/personal.php:0
0.0773 1766328 2. oc_filecache::get() /www/oc/settings/personal.php:20
0.0806 1767536 3. oc_hook::emit() /www/oc/lib/filecache.php:51
0.0945 2502816 4. call_user_func() /www/oc/lib/hook.php:62
0.0956 2539416 5. oca_versions\hooks::write_hook() /www/oc/lib/hook.php:0
0.0983 2674408 6. oca_versions\storage->store() /www/oc/apps/files_versions/lib/hooks.php:28
0.0983 2674408 7. oca_versions\storage::getuidandfilename() /www/oc/apps/files_versions/lib/versions.php:57
0.1002 2706480 8. oc_files_sharing_util::getsourcepath() /www/oc/apps/files_versions/lib/versions.php:42
0.1002 2706480 9. oc_files_sharing_util::getfile() /www/oc/apps/files_sharing/lib/util.php:71
0.1003 2706912 10. strpos() /www/oc/apps/files_sharing/lib/util.php:39
```
(and a bunch of warnings about not being able to modify headers after output has already been sent, but i'm pretty sure these are just follow-ups of the warning shown above).

it could come from some shares which are not accessible anymore (they were on a custom mount, but the files were removed from the filecache i think because the mount.php was removed during upgrade. now i have re-added the mount.php, the files are there again, but the shares are still invalid i think).

because i saw files_sharing directory mentioned, i tried deactivating the sharing app. this made the messages disappear. even reactivating it again didn't make them come up immediately, but after a while they were back.

this screenshot shows what the personal page looks like then: 
![owncloud-strange-personal-page-screenshot](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/2631274/31763/32cabe0a-4fac-11e2-9687-4f5baaa3f379.png)

environment:
oc version: 4.5.5
server: apache 2.2.22 on ubuntu 12.04 server (64 bit)
php 5.3.10-1ubuntu3.4
mysql v14.14 distrib 5.5.28
web interface accessed from firefox 17.0.1 running on windows 7
